==German== {{cardinalbox|de|16|17|18|sechzehn|achtzehn|ord=siebzehnte}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|siebenzehn}} {{qualifier|archaic}} ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|sibunzehan}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*sebuntehun}}. Compare {{cog|nl|zeventien}}, {{cog|fy|santjin}}, {{cog|en|seventeen}}, {{cog|da|sytten}}, Gothic [[𐍃𐌹𐌱𐌿𐌽𐍄𐌰𐌹𐌷𐌿𐌽]] (sibuntaihun). ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈziːptseːn/}} {{a|official standard}} * {{IPA|de|/ˈzɪptseːn/}} {{a|more commonly}} * {{audio|de|De-siebzehn.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # {{cln|de|cardinal numbers}} [[seventeen]] ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|sieben}} * {{l|de|siebzig}} * {{l|de|zehn}}
